mapper.select: SELECT intro_id, row_number() over(order BY intro_id desc) as NO, company_id, intro_title, intro_birth, intro_task, intro_sal, intro_wellfare, intro_content, intro_location, intro_image, job_id from intro

SELECT i.intro_id, i.company_id, i.intro_title, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location, i.job_id, i.intro_image, c.company_name, i.intro_birth FROM intro i LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON i.company_id = c.company_id WHERE intro_id = #{introId}
